Cyborg 009: Kaijuu Sensou:
The evil organization 'Black Ghost' attacked around the world, using dinosaur (plesiosaur) type giant robots, and the team of 9 cyborgs launched their quest for the Black Ghost's hideout. 009 meets a girl named Helena...

(Source: upp.so-net.ne.jp)
